channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 23-Aug-16
item.description:
"Gravity is a habit that is hard to shake off."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 22-Aug-16
item.description:
"Oh, a very useful philosophical animal, your average tortoise. Outrunning metaphorical arrows, beating hares in races... very handy."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 20-Aug-16
item.description:
"I could send you a bone with a file in it, only you'd eat it."

- Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures

item.title: 19-Aug-16
item.description:
"Over the centuries, mankind has tried many ways of combating the forces of evil...prayer, fasting, good works and so on. Up until Doom, no one seemed to have thought about the double-barrel shotgun. Eat leaden death, demon..."

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett
